Name: Say Say
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: MUDDLE tomatoes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: This may have tomatoes in but it is no Bloody Mary. Possibly a tad on the sweet side, but complex none the less.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2008 by J.P. Keating, Saba, Dublin, Republic of Ireland.
